de.bpmnaftool.model.aristaflow.data
Interface DataEdge

All Known Implementing Classes:
DataEdgeImpl
public interface DataEdge

A DataEdge connects a DataElement to a Node. It indicates either a READ or WRITE access to the DataElement.

Author:
Felix Härer

Nested Class Summary
static class DataEdge.EdgeType
          a DataEdge can either read or write a DataElement

 int getConnectorId()
          Unique identifier of the DataEdge.

          Retrieves the connected DataElement

          Returns "READ" or "WRITE" according to the type of the edge.
 Node getNode()
          Retrieves the connected Node
 boolean isOptional()
          If true, the DataEdge may not be used (optional) if the branch it is in, is not executed.

          Unique identifier of the DataEdge.
 

Method Detail

getEdgeType

DataEdge.EdgeType getEdgeType()
Returns "READ" or "WRITE" according to the type of the edge.

Returns:
type of edge

getDataElement

DataElement getDataElement()
Retrieves the connected DataElement

Returns:
connected DataElement

getNode

Node getNode()
Retrieves the connected Node

Returns:
connected Node

isOptional

boolean isOptional()
If true, the DataEdge may not be used (optional) if the branch it is in, is not executed. Default is false.

Returns:
True, if DataEdge is optional. False otherwise.

getConnectorId

int getConnectorId()
Unique identifier of the DataEdge. Starts with 0, incremented by 1 for each new DataEdge.

Returns:
unique identifier of this DataEdge

setConnectorId

void setConnectorId(int connectorId)
Unique identifier of the DataEdge. Starts with 0, incremented by 1 for each new DataEdge.

Parameters:
connectorId - unique identifier of this DataEdge
